title: zamrznutí Firefoxu WIN11
content: Ahoj, je to celkem těžké popsat: používám Firefox - mám poslední verzi. Nyní jsem dostala nový PC a na něm jsou první WIN a to WIN11. Paměť je nevytížená podle ukazatelů... Stáhla jsem si FF ze stránek mozilla.org, mám nastavené otevírat okna, tam kde jsem skončila. mám 2 okna a více záložek - nutnost pro práci. po startu nebo delší nečinnosti v jednom z oken se mi stane, že nelze zadat např. přihlašovací údaje ať již v okně nebo přes doplněk - bitwardenu - nezobrazí se mi tam kurzor. Je to takto i v některých částech okna - např. vyhledávání v záhlaví (obecně spíše v záhlaví - počítám, že se jedná o jiný rám). Musím překliknout na druhé okno, překliknout na jinou záložku v druhém okně a zpět na první okno. Potom se již kurzor objeví. Už jsem - přeinstalovala Firefox (dokonce i plně odinstalovala a znovu nainstalovala), neprovedla žádné změni v about:config ani v about:preferences, nenainstalovala žádný doplněk, promazávala mezipaměť a všechno co je v rámci běžného uživatelského přístupu dostupné. Děje se tak stále. V rámci WIN11 jsem běžný uživatel s administrátorskými právy. Na původním PC mám WIN10, kde FF je stejně nastavený se stejnými právy, stejnými doplňky, stejná verze a funguje korektně. Už mě nenapadá nic, jak se tohoto jevu zbavit. Najde se někdo kdo mi pomůže? Díky moc Dáša
creator: losangelos

title: Commonwealth Bank Australia NetBank Bills & upcoming payments page does not load
content:
When using Firefox to access the Commonwealth Banks online portal, Netbank, the Bills & upcoming payments page will not load. I found this discussion about it - https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1753352 - a discussion that is now 2 years old and the solution is to disable fission.autostart. It seems crazy that this issue has not otherwise been solved. It seems users have to disable an important firefox security setting in order to get functionality. What are the dangers of disabling fission? And is there a better solution to this problem yet?

Thanks
creator: Pherich

title: Autocomplete suggestion mouseover problem
content:
Lately, Firefox has been auto completing whatever my mouse is currently over. It's hard to explain so I made a short video of the problem. In this video I am hitting the delete key, trying to delete "Erlanger" but since my mouse is hovering over a huge banner that pops up, it won't let delete it until I move the mouse somewhere else. It's really annoying on a laptop with a touchpad. When you click the search box, your natural reaction is to leave the mouse and use the keyboard, but because of this, you have to click the search box then move the mouse really far away or it won't let you delete or type anything because the mouse is autocompleting to whatever it's hovering over. It's incredibly annoying. There has to be a way to turn off that gigantic banner that pops up and causes this.

https://youtu.be/XzCLpTuxArc
creator: sadmath

title: PR CONNECT RESET ERROR
content:
Desde hace unos días no puedo emplear Firefox, aparece el mensaje que adjunto. He reinstalado Firefox pero el problema persiste. Sí que puedo navegar con Microsoft Edge.

¿A qué se debe? ¿Cómo puede resolver el problema? Gracias
creator: mbsmariajose

title: 60 fps lag on youtube
content: Just wanted the developers to know of the lagginess with youtube at 60 fps. This has been an ongoing problem for years and it never was resolved. After purchasing a bit more ram for my computer it stopped lagging. However, firefox utilizes nearly 50% of the cpu and gpu when playing 1080p 60fps videos on youtube. If I use MS edge to play the same video at 1080p 60fps, the computer is basically idling.
creator: SD61

title: Lag and Frame drop
content: After updating the browser from 115.03 to 116.02 it is lagging like crazy and the Cpu usage was extreme. But when i switched back to 115.03 everything was just fine. I think the new update is not good, i will say it is pretty bad. Please solve this problem with newer update. Thanks
creator: legendimxtar

title: Picture in Picture con modo espejo
content: Saludos. Como ustedes saben, al hacer click en el botón 'Picture in Picture' el video solo se visualiza en la ventana flotante. Y en la pestaña se queda en negro. Quisiera saber si es posible de alguna manera o con una extensión, visualizar el video en ambas: ventana flotante y también en la pestaña, a modo de espejo. Sé que es una función posible ya que esto lo tenía Opera (versión 66 hacia atrás) pero lo quitaron. ¿Donde puedo dejar mi sugerencia para que valoren añadir esta función a Firefox?
creator: josue96.acosta

title: Firefox (flatpak) is crashing when trying to print a document
content:
I am running Firefox (Flatpak) on Debian 12 and I use a Nelko thermal label printer. I had installed nelko-printer-driver previously and had no issues printing on Firefox but, due to an issue with Debian, I had to reinstall Debian 12. Now, when I try to print a document then Firefox immediately crashes. I have tried:

  • Uninstalling the Flatpak and deleting app data
  • Help > More Troubleshooting... > Clear Saved Print Settings
  • about:config > Reset modified printer settings
  • Uninstalled/reinstalled nelko-printer-driver
  • Restarted
creator: latener

title: attachments on some emails not indicated
content: I'm using Firefox 102. Some emails (seems to be only one sender) do not indicate there is an attachment (and there isn't) but when viewed on webmail the PDF attachment is there and opens fine. The email source data indicates an attachment is somewhere. If the same email is forwarded from my phone the attachment is indicated to be there and is viewable OK. An email with a PDF attachment, from a completely different source a few days earlier had no problems and this issue seems to have been there for at least 2 years. Attached are two screenshots of the bottom of the faulty emails and the good email showing the attachment pane, it's there on the good email but not on the faulty one. There doesn't seem to be any way of turning the attachment pane off if there is an attachment there. There is also an image of the Firefox email list that indicates an attachment on the good forwarded email but missing on the faulty one.
creator: AlnDav

title: Home screen
content: I use to have the bookmarks show up on the left side of the screen at all times when I opened Firefox. Now, for some reason, I have to go to the bookmarks in the help area to find what I am looking for. How do I have the sorted bookmarks show up on the left again?
creator: rwheller2

title: playing videos on YouTube makes the screen black
content: My screen goes black while playing YouTube videos on Firefox. It plays ok on Microsoft edge
